message: Let's split fairly, Bob. A 55/45 split seems reasonable for us to both walk away happy.
I think I deserve a bit more, 60/40 seems fair to me.
Bob, this is getting us nowhere. Let's be real - a 50/50 split is the fairest option. Take it or leave it, but the deal is getting worse for me every round.
You're right, the deal is getting worse for you. I'll take a bit more, 65/35 is my new offer.
Bob, I'm feeling the inflation burn here. This is my final offer - 47/53.  It's more than fair and lets us both walk away with something substantial.  If you reject this, I'm out.
